title: How to install Android 12L on your Google Pixel
content:
After a brief beta period, Google’s big-screen focused Android 12L update has arrived, and you can install it first on Pixel smartphones. Here’s how.

more…

The post How to install Android 12L on your Google Pixel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 12L has arrived and the big-screen focused version of Android is available first on Pixel; here's how to install it.
